thread.title: Thursday's TV pick: Pride Of Britain Awards
thread.title_full: Thursday's TV pick: Pride Of Britain Awards

title: Thursday's TV pick: Pride Of Britain Awards
text:
Submit 
Â© ITV Carol Vorderman is hosting the annual Daily Mirror Pride Of Britain Awards , as we celebrate ordinary people doing extraordinary things. Packed full of stories of courage, selflessness and achievement against the odds, the winners will get a few surprises from a host of famous faces.Celebrities packing the red carpet and queuing up to honour the brave and deserving include Simon Cowell, Cheryl Fernandez-Versini, David Walliams, Mark Wright, Alesha Dixon, Olly Murs, Caroline Flack, and Holly Willoughby. Daily Mirror Pride Of Britain Awards, ITV, 8pm
